title: Lectio Divina
shortDescription: A method of meditating on a bible passage, letting God draw your attention to what he wants to work in you.

steps.title: Prepare Yourself
steps.shortDescription: Prepare yourself for what you are about to do
steps.LongDescription: This is the longer description about what you specifically need to do to preare yourself...

steps.title: First Reading
steps.LongDescription: Read the passage through once slowly and notice the words and phrases that catch your attention

steps.title: Second Reading
steps.shortDescription: Read the passage through a second time.
steps.LongDescription: I can't remember offhand what you're meant to do especially in this step

steps.title: Meditate
steps.shortDescription: Meditate on the word or phrase that the Holy Spirit guided you to.

title: Holy Listening
shortDescription: A step by step method of listening to each other led by God

steps.title: Initial Prayer
steps.shortDescription: Pray for what you are about to do
steps.LongDescription: This is the longer description about what you specifically need to do to preare yourself...

steps.title: Speaker speaks
steps.shortDescription: The speaker speaks what is on their heart/what God showed them to talk about..
steps.LongDescription: Read the passage through once slowly and notice the words and phrases that catch your attention

steps.title: Listener listens
steps.shortDescription: The listener listens to what God might be saying to that person.
steps.LongDescription: I can't remember offhand what you're meant to do especially in this step

steps.title: Listener speaks
steps.shortDescription: The listener speaks what they felt God gave to them.

steps.title: Speaker listens
steps.shortDescription: The speaker listens and discerns what God wants to say to him through the Listener.

steps.title: Speaker responds
steps.shortDescription: The speaker listens and discerns what God wants to say to him through the Listener.
